summary: This bill, the 'Protecting Patient Access to Cancer and Complex Therapies Act,' amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a rebate program for manufacturers of selected drugs and biological products subject to maximum fair price negotiation under Medicare Part B. It outlines requirements for manufacturers to provide rebates, specifies how beneficiary coinsurance is calculated, and details deposit procedures. The bill also makes conforming amendments to several sections of the Social Security Act related to payment amounts and rebate information disclosure.
